name: Immortal Truth
description:
Where is she? You call out her name. No reply. Oh God, where could she be? Wait— you've been here before. Or have you? Where are you? The darkness seems to engulf you. Are you even you? You can't stop sobbing. You search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and...Game Features:
  • Uncover the truth in a horrific and emotional story.
  • Solve puzzles and search for clues to piece together what happened.
  • Dynamic level design will have you questioning every step.
  • Original music, sound, and art stitch together the environment.
